shipEats.header: Order the best bites and bevs
shipEats.subHeader: From champagne to light and healthy snacks, choose from any of our bites and bev options.
Thanks to The Band, our crew can deliver to more spots than just your cabin.
The pool, most outdoor spaces, the catamaran, and Richard’s Rooftop. If you can spread out, so can our spreads.

description: Our spin on room service-and-beyond. You'll be able to:
title: Ship Eats Delivery
